attributes.additional_details:
1) We note the extensive and widespread attacks on Christians and their Churches in Egypt and other buildings and homes on 15 and 16 August 2013 etc and the campaign of terror against them. This is being led by the Muslim Brotherhood according to Church sources in Egypt. We ask the UK government to oppose these attacks.
2) We ask the UK government to designate Egypt's Muslim Brotherhood a terrorist organisation for its attacks on Christians (inc. Copts) and their Churches, buildings and homes in Egypt.
